tech_news.title: Mass Effect TV Series Won't Retread Shepard's Story And Will Be Set After The Original Trilogy - IGN

The Linux Kernel Looks To "Bite The Bullet" In Enabling Microsoft C Extensions - Phoronix
tech_news.description: Two patches queued into the Linux kernel's build system development tree, kbuild-next, would enable the -fms-extensions compiler argument everywhere for allowing GCC and LLVM/Clang to use the Microsoft C Extensions when compiling the Linux kernel
